response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. Considering its unique features and unparalleled quality, we believe it is worth more than $1,200,000. However, to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at a special price of $1,100,000. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional offer.", "product_price": 1100000}
